plot: Young lame Jenny and the other neighborhood kids don't realize that their kind playmate Old Ben is really an intergalactic fugitive hiding out - until two serious men come looking for him and asking questions that test their friendship.

Little Jenny wears a brace on her leg. Her best friend, an old man named Old Ben, brightens her life by performing magic, including turning into anything he wants. One day, two men show up looking for Old Ben and Jenny asks if they are policemen. Not exactly. Old Ben evades them and confesses to Jenny that he's from another planet - a fugitive but not a criminal.—Bob Beecher
